text:
Comedian Bhuvan Bam Just Dubbed Akash Ambani And Shloka Mehta's Wedding And It's Hilarious
Comedian Bhuvan Bam Just Dubbed Akash Ambani And Shloka Mehta's Wedding And It's Hilarious
For those who have been following Bhuvan Bam know he's hilarious. He rose to fame with BB Vines and dubbing tactics especially during Virat-Anushka's wedding reception. The funnyman then dubbed Meghan Markle-Prince Harry's wedding.
And now, the comedian Bhuvan Bam has dubbed the big wedding of 2019. The wedding of Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta was one of the most lavish functions in Mumbai last evening.
Twitter
From Bollywood A-listers, senior politicians to foreign delegates, celebrities graced the occasion with full force and fervour. The popular entertainer has made a hilarious 3 part video about the big fam jam and it will leave you in splits.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 346 SHARES 183 SHARES 151 SHARES 185 SHARES
Take a look.
The boy has spared nobody including Ban Ki Moon.
